snippet.title: ⭐ Super Mario 64 PC Port - Gore/Hard-Mode! v1.1
snippet.description:
''Same mod, but updated with a number of different bug-fixes and tweaks!. You should definitely upgrade to this version!

Fixes:
Pressing Dpad Down no longer gives player 3 stars. (This was a leftover function for testing.)
Players no longer have doubled/tripled speed when flying or sliding with others present.
Fixed camera for Free_cam users in the final boss fight.
Fixed Piranha Plant and Pokey characters from doubling/tripling projectiles.
(HMC) Fixed Dorries Cavern rendering bug when elevator clipping.
(TTM) Fixed script errors when leaving slide.
(TTM) Fixed warp point for when Mario leaves the slide.
Heave-Ho enemies no longer kill all players when launching one player.
Partial fix for certain audio instances playing multiple times.
Shockwaves now travel faster, so be on the lookout for that.
You can now hear other players splat.

Shoutout to Sherb for reporting these bugs and testing the fixes with me. Please report any other bugs to me and I will try to fix them! -IncredibleHolc''

#supermario64  #sm64pc  #pcport #sm64 #mario64 #sm64hacks #mario #romhack #mod  #n64 #playthrough #longplay #fullgame #gameplay #walkthrough #games #gaming #projectlongplay
